1575800810_1DfbNohg1UZxEJXMGS4W46bSSh3Ag.body: Yes you can make a pc with those specs

1575880894_1JszzaxuPyozejWGkm7VyEEkXNCj5.body:
Paste about:config on url bar.Set this value to 0:
network.proxy.type = 0
And toggle this:
network.proxy.socks_remote_dns = false
You will have to do this everytime you restart your tor browser.Good luck.
